item.description: Stop Giving Companies Your Real Emailâ€”Do This Instead This article was originally published at How-To Geek. Ad agencies and hackers have something in commonâ€”they want to know our email addresses. We unwitting give this information away every time we sign up for a website, leaving ourselves increasingly exposed to spam, ad profiling, and cyberattacks. Thankfully, you can prevent your email address from being weaponized. You just need to use email aliases.
